ü•à 2nd Place

üèÖ Leaderboard (Rank 4+)
Rank User Total Points
{{ user.rank }} {{ user.name }} {{ user.totalPoints }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../../models/user'; import { UserService } from '../../services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-leaderboard', templateUrl: './leaderboard.component.html', }) export class LeaderboardComponent implements OnInit { topThree: User[] = []; restLeaderboard: User[] = []; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchLeaderboard(); setInterval(() => this.fetchLeaderboard(), 5000); } fetchLeaderboard(): void { this.userService.getLeaderboard().subscribe((data) => { this.topThree = data.slice(0, 3); this.restLeaderboard = data.slice(3); }); } }
